code: @Manual{,   title = {DCF: Tools for various processing of DCF data},   author = {Anders Kagervall},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.6.1},   url = {https://slu-aqua-salmonids.github.io/DCF/}, }

title: Tools for various processing of DCF data
text: Package DCF provides tools various processing DCF salmon data Access sers electrofishing data, create maps, calculate parr densities etc.

title: Tools for various processing of DCF data
text: can install Package DCF GitHub :

title: Tools for various processing of DCF data
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(DCF) ## Display known rivers names(efish_sites) #>  [1] "Torneälven"      "Kalixälven"      "Råneälven"       "Åbyälven"        #>  [5] "Byskeälven"      "Kågeälven"       "Rickleån"        "Sävarån"         #>  [9] "Vindelälven"     "Öreälven"        "Lögdeälven"      "Ljungan"         #> [13] "Testeboån"       "Emån"            "Mörrumsån"       "Alslövsån"       #> [17] "Arödsån"         "Bratteforsån"    "Brattorpsån"     "Brostorpsån"     #> [21] "Bäljane å"       "Bäveån"          "Edenbergaån"     "Enningdalsälven" #> [25] "Fageredsån"      "Forsån"          "Fylleån"         "Grönån"          #> [29] "Himleån"         "Hämmensån"       "Högvadsån"       "Kungsbackaån"    #> [33] "Kynne älv"       "Lindomeån"       "Långevallsälven" "Löftaån"         #> [37] "Munkedalsälven"  "Nissan"          "Pinnån"          "Rolfsån"         #> [41] "Rönne å"         "Rördalsån"       "Rössjöholmsån"   "Sennan"          #> [45] "Slissån"         "Smedjeån"        "Sollumsån"       "Stensån"         #> [49] "Storån"          "Strömsån"        "Surtan"          "Suseån"          #> [53] "Säveån"          "Sörån"           "Tvååkers kanal"  "Törlan"          #> [57] "Vessingeån"      "Viskan"          "Vättlandsån"     "Ätran"           #> [61] "Örekilsälven" # Print table of known sites in river Rickleån sites <- dcf_known_efish_sites("Rickleån") knitr::kable(sites) catch <- dcf_get_efish_data(river = "Rickleån", year = 2024) head(catch) #>                   name xkoorlok ykoorlok         section area used since #> 1        Nättingforsen   711897   175020   Nedan Bruksf. 15.0 TRUE     0 #> 2       Laxbacksforsen   712460   174705   Nedan Bruksf. 15.0 TRUE     0 #> 3        Åströmsforsen   712520   174650   Nedan Bruksf. 15.0 TRUE     0 #> 4 Isakfäbodforsen övre   713322   174119 Ovan Fredriksf. 16.8 TRUE  2018 #> 5       Tjärdalsforsen   713426   174010 Ovan Fredriksf. 16.8 TRUE  2018 #> 6     Faranforsen övre   713511   173898 Ovan Fredriksf. 16.8 TRUE  2018 #>   Comment haronr vattendrag                lokal fiskedatum  syfte hoh lax0 lax #> 1      NA  24000   Rickleån        Nättingforsen   20240923 Nö-lax   2  1.7 4.1 #> 2      NA  24000   Rickleån       Laxbacksforsen   20240923 Nö-lax  17 14.3 4.6 #> 3      NA  24000   Rickleån        Åströmsforsen   20240923 Nö-lax  20  9.0 3.3 #> 4      NA  24000   Rickleån Isakfäbodforsen övre   20240925 Nö-lax  61  0.0 0.0 #> 5      NA  24000   Rickleån       Tjärdalsforsen   20240925 Nö-lax  64 21.9 4.5 #> 6      NA  24000   Rickleån     Faranforsen övre   20241002 Nö-lax  80 15.0 2.5 #>   lax0ber laxber lax0pval laxpval öring0 öring örin0ber öringber öri0pval #> 1       1      1     0.45    0.55    1.6   0.0        1       -9     0.48 #> 2       3      3     0.83    0.98    1.9   1.1        3        1     0.79 #> 3       1      1     0.45    0.55    0.8   0.0        1       -9     0.48 #> 4      NA     NA       NA    0.00    2.6   0.0        1       -9     0.48 #> 5       1      1     0.45    0.55    5.1   0.0        1       -9     0.48 #> 6       3      3     0.62    0.99    0.6   1.5        1        3     0.86 #>   örinpval antutfis metod bredd langd fished_area #> 1     0.00        1  Kval    31    21         132 #> 2     0.91        3 Kvant    27    32         202 #> 3     0.00        1  Kval    39    26         272 #> 4     0.00        1  Kval what: dcf_efish_app: A Shiny app for displaying e-fishing data — dcf_efish_app
title: dcf_efish_app: A Shiny app for displaying e-fishing data — dcf_efish_app
text: app displays e-fishing data known DCF efishing sites. primary use examine expected sites fished identify missing sites also duplicates

title: dcf_efish_app: A Shiny app for displaying e-fishing data — dcf_efish_app
dcf_efish_app: A Shiny app for displaying e-fishing data — dcf_efish_app

what: Get electrofishing data for a river for one species one year — dcf_get_efish_data
title: Get electrofishing data for a river for one species one year — dcf_get_efish_data
text: Get electrofishing data river one species one year

title: Get electrofishing data for a river for one species one year — dcf_get_efish_data
code: dcf_get_efish_data(   river,   year = as.numeric(format(Sys.Date(), "%Y")),   year2 = NULL,   wanted_sites = dcf_known_efish_sites(river) )

title: Get electrofishing data for a river for one species one year — dcf_get_efish_data
text: river character string name river. year numeric year query string "". Default current year year2 optional numeric return results year year2 sites data frame xkoorlok ykoorlok

title: Get electrofishing data for a river for one species one year — dcf_get_efish_data
text: Return data frame electro fishing results. "fiskedat" NA site fished time period.

title: Get electrofishing data for a river for one species one year — dcf_get_efish_data

Get electro fishing site info — dcf_known_efish_sites
text: river character Name river as_sf logical. TRUE return sites sf object. Default FALSE site_list list data frames. Default DCF::efish_sites

title: Get electro fishing site info — dcf_known_efish_sites
text: data frame information sites river. See [DCF::efish_sites]

title: Get electro fishing site info — dcf_known_efish_sites

what: Return catchment name for river — dcf_rivername2haroname
title: Return catchment name for river — dcf_rivername2haroname
text: function returns catchment name river. catchment name data frame columns `rivername` `haroname`. default data frame `DCF::riverinfo` contains information rivers monitored DCF-program.

title: Return catchment name for river — dcf_rivername2haroname
Return catchment name for river — dcf_rivername2haroname
text: river character vector river names rinfo data frame columns `rivername` `haroname`. Default DCF::riverinfo

title: Return catchment name for river — dcf_rivername2haroname
text: character vector catchment names rivers.

title: Return catchment name for river — dcf_rivername2haroname

what: Electofishing sites monitored in the DCF-program (WGBAST and WGNAS) — efish_sites
title: Electofishing sites monitored in the DCF-program (WGBAST and WGNAS) — efish_sites
text: Dataset DCF::efish_sites contains information electrofishing sites monitored DCF-program. Xkoorlok ykoorlok primary key find unique site SERS. `DCF::WGBAST_rivers` `DCF::WGNAS_rivers` character vectors rivers monitored WG. vectors can, example, used loop processing rivers working group.

title: Electofishing sites monitored in the DCF-program (WGBAST and WGNAS) — efish_sites
Electofishing sites monitored in the DCF-program (WGBAST and WGNAS) — efish_sites
text: WGBAST_rivers: vector  names Swedish WGBAST rivers. names can used select data `efish_sites`. WGNAS_rivers: vector  names Swedish WGNAS rivers. names can used select data `efish_sites`. efish_sites: list data frames, one river. item named river.    data frame variables: name site name xkoorlok RT90 X coordinate / 10 Used primary key SERS xkoorlok RT90 Y coordinate / 10 Used primary key SERS section Name section (blank river divided sections) area Estimated production area hektar (per section river divided) used logical Indicates site used working group estimations since numerical First year site used estimations. Zero = used since start object class character length 15. object class character length 46.

title: Electofishing sites monitored in the DCF-program (WGBAST and WGNAS) — efish_sites
text: https://www.slu.se/institutioner/akvatiska-resurser/databaser/elfiskeregistret/ https://www.ices.dk/community/groups/Pages/WGBAST.aspx https://www.ices.dk/community/groups/Pages/WGNAS.aspx

title: River information — riverinfo
River information — riverinfo
text: riverinfo: data frame information rivers monitored DCF-program. Used translate river names catchment names. river River name haroname Catchment name haronr Catchment number
